reviews.headline: Better than Paula's choice
reviews.comments: I used this product first, then tried Paula's choice, and the clear winner is this one. I find the Paula's choice left a film on my skin, while the BLK/OPL left my skin feeling fresh. Lot's of benefits and I just like that there is no residue left behind.

reviews.headline: Not a Fan
reviews.comments: I have combination acne prone skin. I've been using Glow Recipe's PHA + BHA toner for a few years & loved it. I bought this toner as a possible more affordable alternative to the Glow Recipe toner. I've been using this toner consistently for about a month & I'm not a fan. It goes on tacky & leaves my skin dry even after applying moisturizer afterward. Plus, I noticed that there's a lot of pilling when I use it. I don't know if it's user error or if this doesn't play well with my other products. I'll switch back to Glow Recipe or find another similar toner.

reviews.headline: Better than Paulas
reviews.comments:
I disagree with the other review saying it's a Paula's dupe.....it's better. It's just as effective but also fades dark spots and doesn't have the oily texture Paula's has. 

Other exfoliants do better for dark spots but the PHA works well enough that I think of it as a bonus since I primarily use BHAs for acne control.
